StructuredXMLResume.ExecutiveSummary: * 6+ years of experience as an administrator and diversified experience on Design, Analysis, Development , Implementation and maintenance of Client-Server, Web and distributed environment. ; * Extensive experience as a SharePoint Administrator in installing, configuring and administrating SP 2013, SP 2010, WSS 3.0 and MOSS2007. ;

ExperienceSummary.ExecutiveBrief: Deepa Ahuja has been working in the IT occupational sector for more than 8 years. Currently he is employed as an Administrator at Valmont. Deepa has extensive knowledge of Microsoft SharePoint, Microsoft Internet Information Server, Microsoft Office, Active Directory, AD, Microsoft SQL Server 2008, Microsoft SQL Server, Microsoft Outlook, Microsoft Office 2007, XML, SharePoint Designer, SPS2003, SMTP, Microsoft Excel, HTML, SQL, Microsoft SQL Server 2005, Microsoft Exchange Server, Microsoft Exchange 2010, Microsoft Exchange 2007, IBM WebSphere, Domain Name Server Protocol, Cascading Style Sheets, Uninterruptible Power Supply, Sysload Software, Microsoft Word, Microsoft Visual Studio.NET, Microsoft Visual Studio, MS Windows Server 2008 R2, MS Office Business Application, Lotus Notes/Domino, Edition. So far Deepa has not gained any managerial experience.
